isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - 2000, 4000, 8000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - 4000 SERIES MUD GUARDS

svcsubproc.title: 4700 Thru 4900 Model Mud Guard - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 53 for items in parentheses.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX BOLT AND FLAT WASHER (1/4-20 UNC)

step1.para: Remove the pan head screws and flat washers (Item 1), lockwashers and hex nuts (Item 2) securing the mud guard (Item 3) and reinforcement (Item 4) to the inside bottom edge of the fender extension (Item 5). Remove the mud guard and reinforcement, driver side shown.
Repeat procedure to remove passenger side mud guard and reinforcement.

svcsubproc.title: 4700 Thru 4900 Model Mud Guard - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 53 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the mud guard (Item 3) and reinforcement (Item 4) on the inside bottom edge of the fender extension (Item 5) and install the pan head screws with flat washers (Item 1) through the fender extension, mud guard and reinforcement. Then install lockwashers and hex nuts (Item 2), driver side shown. Tighten to 125 to 140 in-lbs. (14 to 16 Nm).
Repeat procedure to install passenger side mud guard and reinforcement.
